column2: "Too many young members these days are neglecting to upgrade their weapon elements. We shouldn't let them slack off like that, if you ask me."
"If you fuse the weapons you've worked so hard to obtain, you can get a completely new one--one that can be your most trusted partner in the world."
"What about you? Maybe you ought to go do some upgrades while we're on the subject."
"Upgrade what? Your weapon elements! Haven't you been listening? You'd best pay attention. Now go use your synthesizer at the Item Lab."
"Well, what are you waiting for? It's not rocket science. Now go put my mind at ease by making some upgrades, all right?"
"You can upgrade weapon elements at the Item Lab. Upgrading allows you to boost a weapon's elemental attributes. "

"You need the following to upgrade elements: - Meseta - A Synthesizer - A component weapon  You can upgrade the effect of weapon elements such as fire or ice. Using a component weapon with the same attribute as the one you are upgrading raises its attribute value."

"同名の武器を素材にすると、
属性値が大きく上昇します。

※同名＆同属性だと、さらに上昇します。

属性値は最大50までですが、
レアリティ★13の武器は
最大60までアップします。"

"属性値が高いほど
エネミーへのダメージが増加します。

さらに「属性」が
エネミーの「弱点属性」と同じ場合は、
より大ダメージを与えられます。

「属性」は武器の入手時に決まりますが、
「補助アイテム」で変更可能です。"
"『ガンスラッシュゼロ-NT』を入手しました。"
